# DocSearch Crawler Comparison

## Decision Flow
1. Multiple locales? → Use i18n template (start_urls with lang tags)
2. Need fine-grained sections? → Advanced template (area tags, stop_urls)
3. Ranking feels off? → Add ranking template (searchableAttributes/customRanking)
4. Breadcrumb context weak? → Hierarchy template (lvl0..lvl4 selectors)

## Summary
- Minimal: quick start; good defaults
- Advanced: section tags, noise exclusion
- i18n: multi-locale start_urls/sitemaps, lang facets
- Ranking: searchableAttributes first by hierarchy, then content
- Hierarchy: precise heading selectors per theme

## Tips
- Prefer sitemap; limit crawl rate on large sites
- Test with keyboard and screen readers
- Re-run crawl after structural changes
